extended by my switch.

AmudhaK

-----Original Message-----
From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com]On Behalf Of
Andreas Guther
Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2006 12:07 PM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [junit] testing XML APIs


In case you are interested in testing XML generated by your Java
applications, I can recommend XmlUnit.  It compare a given XML against
an expected XML.

 

Andreas

 

 

________________________________

From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of
Amudha Karuppannan
Sent: Wednesday, July 05, 2006 6:42 AM
To: 'junit@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: [junit] testing XML APIs

 


Hello all,

I just want to know whether we can test XML APIs using junit.

Thanks and regards,
AmudhaK
